Title: Relates to the compensation and medical expenses of certain injured state employees
Summary: Relates to the compensation and medical expenses of certain injured state employees; requires the state to pay for the salary, wages, medical and hospital expenses of parole revocation specialist title series, revenue crime specialist title series or investigative officer title series who are injured or are taken sick in the performance of his or her duties.
LawCode: Add ยง209-c, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the compensation and medical expenses of certain injured state employees
